data.actual_result: you just end up in a ghost text channel.
data.expected_result: you open the drawer sheet for a voice channel.
data.short_description: Ghost text channels are opened by tapping links that go to voice channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with a voice channel. - Craft a  link to a voice channel in the server (ask others for ids if needed) - Tap the link and observe.
